messages.message: @sean.donohoe Sometimes, when I load the frontend, my crafting sandbox becomes extremely slow (it takes a couple mins to load a webpage) and the CPU resource usage jumps to 100% but later will get back down to 1%. Usually restarting my sandbox helps but it's annoying when it happens multiple times a day...

I'm not sure what specifically would be causing this, but we can try capturing some resource consumption data when it's happening to help diagnose -- next time this comes up could you ping me with the output of `top`? I feel like this is likely either being triggered by vscode behaving oddly or something not mixing well with ppy
Thank you! I'll make sure I do that next time
Sorry this is so frustrating, I completely understand where you're coming from and definitely want to sort this out for you, thanks for all the patience :slightly_smiling_face:
